text: Pierre Kezdy (January 4, 1962 - October 9, 2020) was an American bass player. He was born in Chicago. Kezdy was known for playing with many Chicago punk bands, including Naked Raygun, Pegboy, Strike Under, Arsenal, and Trial By Fire. Kezdy died of cancer on October 9, 2020 while under hospice care in Glenview, Illinois at the age of 58. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Illinois Category:American rock musicians Category:American punk musicians Category:Musicians from Chicago
title: Pierre Kezdy
